title: Cannabis' Tissue Culture Technology With David Brough
author: Seeking Alpha
dc:creator: Seeking Alpha
description: David Brough is CEO of Klonetics Plant Science and has had extensive experience in the oil and gas industry. He joins Rena Sherbill to discuss getting more profitability from growers and creating new strains with world-class breeders. They also discussed tissue culture technology, international expansion and the similarities between energy and cannabis sectors. Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
